pr_title: [dart-dio] Allow dynamic headers and add additional dio parameters

timeline.bodyText: never seen this syntax before. basically headerParams gets content of headers if headers is initialised?
timeline.author: agilob

replies.bodyText: Ya basically like the ecma spread operator. Works for all collections.
replies.author: kuhnroyal

timeline.message:
[dart-dio] Allow dynamic headers and add additional dio parameters

* fixes some compile errors due to header params not being of type `String`
* add optional `extra` and `validateStatus` parameters from dio

[dart-dio] Allow dynamic headers and add additional dio parameters

* fixes some compile errors due to header params not being of type `String`
* add optional `extra` and `validateStatus` parameters from dio
